title.rendered: Advantages of Equity Financing for Amazon Sellers – Debt Vs Equity with Ben Kotch of AccrueMe

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 18:52 — 17.3MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 18:52 — 17.3MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

Ben Kotch is an investor and advisor in various early and growth-stage companies including many e-commerce ventures.

He is an active Amazon seller and advises thousands of Amazon business owners through his affiliation with ALGO Online Retail

What You’ll Learn

  • A Simple Division : Debt vs Equity
  • Investments : Where to start when asking for a loan
  • The equity for AccrueMe : “preferred equity investment”
  • What’s A Good Use for Loans?
  • The value of equity and just how it makes sense for Ben
  • An creating an Exit Strategy on your Loan

Resources
